dct_title_s: Le Pays des Hottentots aux environs du Cap de Bonne Espérance
dct_description_sm: Shows coast from St Helena Bay to Mossel Bay and corresponding area inland.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map, given in "Lieues Marines de France" and "Lieues d’Allemagne."
Bottom left of map: "Tome V. in 4o. No. 5"; bottom right of map: "Tome 3. in 8o Page 391".
"Cette Carte est dressée sur celles de Kolbe et sur quelques Manuscrits du Depost des Plans de la Marine. Par N. Bellin Ingr. de la Marine."
dct_spatial_sm: Good Hope, Cape of (South Africa : Cape)
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
